mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER (ID, NAME, PASSWORD, EMAIL, PHONE, PCODE, ADDR, ETCADDR, BIRTH) VALUES (#{id},#{name},#{password},#{email},#{phone},#{pCode},#{addr},#{etcAddr},#{birth})
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET NAME=#{name},PASSWORD=#{password},EMAIL=#{email},PHONE=#{phone},PCODE=#{pCode}, ADDR=#{addr}, ETCADDR=#{etcAddr}, BIRTH=#{birth}, PROFILE=#{profile} WHERE ID=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM MEMBER WHERE ID=#{id} AND PASSWORD=#{password}
